subject: Another video
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:

I just grab the camera to make a quickie recording, since I almost always 
have it one me.

"Listening to Pegasus" at 8 seconds?, and at 12 seconds "this one's better 
yet".

With the echo box moved away from the chasis, and monitor speaker, I can get 
much more volume out of the monitor speaker.

Frank-S
